eva

Interface Database

      • EAVT

        static final java.lang.Object EAVT

        Pass to methods that consume an index name like datoms(Object, Object...)

        Pass to methods that consume an index name like datoms(Object, Object...)

        Pass to methods that consume an index name like datoms(Object, Object...)

      • VAET

        Pass to methods that consume an index name like datoms(Object, Object...)

      • attribute

        Attribute attribute(java.lang.Object attrId)
        Retrieves information about an Attribute.
        Parameters:
        attrId - entity identifier (entity-id or ident-keyword) of an attributee
        Returns:
        an Attribute if one exists

      • attributeStrict

        Attribute attributeStrict(java.lang.Object attrId)
        Retrieves information about an Attribute.
        Parameters:
        attrId - entity identifier (entity-id or ident-keyword) of an attributee
        Returns:
        an Attribute if one exists, if not, throws.

      • basisT

        long basisT()
        The transaction id of the most recent transaction in this database.
        Returns:
        a transaction id

      • nextT

        long nextT()
        The next transaction id that will be assigned in this database.
        Returns:
        a transaction id

      • datoms

        java.lang.Iterable<Datom> datoms(java.lang.Object index,
                                 java.lang.Object... components)
        Provides raw access to the database indexes.

        Must pass the index-name. May pass one or more leading components of the index to constrain the results.

        The following indexes may be searched:

        EAVT
        contains all datoms sorted by entity-id, attribute-id, value, and transaction
        AEVT
        contains all datoms sorted by attribute-id, entity-id, value, and transaction
        AVET
        contains datoms with indexed and unique attributes (except for bytes values) sorted by attribute-id, value, entity-id, and transaction
        VAET
        contains datoms with attributes of :db.type/ref; VAET acts as the reverse index for backwards traversal of refs
        Parameters:
        index - one of: EAVT, AEVT, AVET, VAET
        components - any datom components (entity-id, attribute, value, or transaction) specified in the order of the chosen index
        Returns:
        datoms in the chosen index which match the components

      • isExtantEntity

        java.lang.Boolean isExtantEntity(java.lang.Object entityId)
        Returns true if there exists at least one datom in the database with the provided entity identifier.
        Parameters:
        entityId - an entity-identifier
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the entity exists.

      • entid

        java.lang.Object entid(java.lang.Object entityId)
        Coerces any entity-identifier into an entity-id. Does *not* confirm existence of an entity id, except incidentally through some coercion processes.

        To check for existence of an entity, please use isExtantEntity(Object)

        Parameters:
        entityId - an entity-identifier
        Returns:
        id or nil if entityId cannot be coerced.

      • entids

        java.lang.Object entids(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> entityIds)
        Like entid but operates in a batch. Prefer this method if you need to coerce multiple ids.
        Parameters:
        entityIds - a list of entityIds or entity-identifiers (keywords or lookup references)
        Returns:
        a list (in the same order) of ids or nil if no id exists

      • entidStrict

        java.lang.Object entidStrict(java.lang.Object entityId)
        Behaves the same as entid, but instead throws where entid would return nil.

      • entidsStrict

        java.lang.Object entidsStrict(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> entityIds)
        Analogy -- entid : entidStrict :: entids entidsStrict.

      • entity

        Entity entity(java.lang.Object entityId)
        Returns an Entity, which is a dynamic, lazy-loaded projection of the datoms that share the same entity-id.
        Parameters:
        entityId - entity identifier
        Returns:
        an Entity

      • ident

        java.lang.Object ident(java.lang.Object idOrKey)
        Returns the keyword-identifier associated with an id.
        Parameters:
        idOrKey - entity-id or keyword
        Returns:
        keyword identifier or nil if doesn't exists

      • identStrict

        java.lang.Object identStrict(java.lang.Object idOrKey)
        Returns the keyword-identifier associated with an id. Throws an exception if none exists.
        Parameters:
        idOrKey - entity-id or keyword
        Returns:
        keyword identifier

      • asOfT

        java.lang.Long asOfT()
        If this database isn't the latest snapshot at the time it was constructed, return the tx-num of the log entry / transaction this database was constructed from to reflect; else null.
        Returns:
        null if this database is the latest snapshot; the tx-num of the latest log entry elsewise.

      • snapshotT

        java.lang.Long snapshotT()
        Yields the most recently known database snapshot, which is maintained in memory.

      • asOf

        Database asOf(java.lang.Object t)
        Returns a historical database value at some point in time t, inclusive.
        Parameters:
        t - A transaction number or id.
        Returns:
        The database value at point in time t

      • invoke

        java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.Object entityID,
                        java.lang.Object... args)
        Looks up database function identified by entityId and invokes the function with args.
        Parameters:
        entityID - entity-identifier of function entity
        args - args to pass to function
        Returns:
        value returned by invoking function

      • pull

        java.util.Map pull(java.lang.Object pattern,
                   java.lang.Object entityId)
        Executes a pull-query returning a hierarchical selection of attributes for entityId.
        Parameters:
        pattern - a pattern or a string containing a pattern in EDN format
        entityId - an entity-identifier
        Returns:
        a map containing the hierarchical selection requested

      • pullMany

        java.util.List<java.util.Map> pullMany(java.lang.Object pattern,
                                       java.util.List entityIds)
        Returns multiple hierarchical selections for the passed entity-identifiers.
        Parameters:
        pattern - a pattern or a string containing a pattern in EDN format
        entityIds - list of entity-identifiers
        Returns:
        list of maps contains the hierarchical selections requested

      • history

        Database history()
        Returns a special view of the database containing *all* datoms, asserted or retracted across time. Currently supports the 'datoms' and 'q' functions.
        Returns:
        a database containing all datoms across time.

      • with

        java.util.Map with(java.util.List txData)
        Simulates a transaction locally without persisting the updated state.
        Parameters:
        txData - a list of transaction data, follows the same format as the argument to 'transact'
        Returns:
        a map with the same contents as the future from 'transact'
